section_title: Procedure for varying charges at off-street parking places
section_text: 1 1 Section 35C of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 (variation of charges at off-street parking places) is amended as follows. 2 In subsection (4), after paragraph (a) insert— aa consultation about their proposal; . 3 After subsection (4) insert— 4A Regulations under this section may make different provision for different purposes. .

section_title: Procedure for varying charges at designated parking places
section_text: 2 1 Section 46A of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 (variation of charges at designated parking places) is amended as follows. 2 In subsection (4), after paragraph (a) insert— aa consultation about their proposal; . 3 After subsection (4) insert— 4A Regulations under this section may make different provision for different purposes.

section_title: Commencement, extent, application and short title
section_text: 3 1 This Act comes into force at the end of the period of 2 months beginning with the day on which this Act is passed. 2 This Act extends to England and Wales. 3 But the amendments made by sections 1 and 2 apply only in relation to regulations made by the Secretary of State. 4 This Act may be cited as the Parking Places (Variation of Charges) Act 2017.
